## packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(ggrepel)
```

## read in data

```{r}
my_url="http://ritsokiguess.site/datafiles/caribou.txt"
denali=read_table(my_url)
denali
```

make dates

```{r}
(denali %>% mutate(date=mdy(date)) -> denali)
```

## plot caribou and wolf against time with dual y axis

start with caribou

```{r}
ggplot(denali, aes(x=date, y=caribou))+geom_line(aes(colour="caribou"))
```

add the wolf to it

```{r}
ggplot(denali, aes(x=date, y=caribou))+geom_line(aes(colour="caribou"))+geom_line(aes(y=wolf, colour="wolf"))
```

add the second axis

```{r}
ggplot(denali, aes(x=date, y=caribou))+geom_line(aes(colour="caribou"))+
  geom_line(aes(y=wolf/2.5, colour="wolf"))+
  scale_y_continuous(sec.axis=sec_axis(~./2.5,name="wolf"))

```
